text:
[Verse]
Paper planes we fly so high
Watch them soar into the sky
Every fold a dream we try
Feeling free just you and I

[Verse 2]
In the park where kids all play
Let the wind just guide away
Simple joys in light of day
Hope it never fades to gray

[Chorus]
Paper airplanes taking flight
In the morning in the night
Set our worries out of sight
All is magic all is light

[Verse 3]
Through the breeze I hear you cheer
Laughter echoing so near
Worries vanish disappear
Paper trails that we steer

[Bridge]
Hold my hand let’s make some more
Perfect glides never a chore
Joy we’ll find forevermore
Paper planes forever soar

[Chorus]
Paper airplanes taking flight
In the morning in the night
Set our worries out of sight
All is magic all is light
title: Paper Airplanes
